full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal for Technical Writing Services**

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites proposals from pre-qualified suppliers for the provision of technical writing services.

**Overview**

This requirement is seeking the services of a Senior Technical Writer and two (2) Intermediate Technical Writers to support the DND's project management services under Stream 3. The proposed contract term is for three (3) years, with the option to extend by up to two (2) one-year periods.

**Pre-qualified suppliers**

Only the following suppliers are eligible to submit proposals:

[List of pre-qualified suppliers, please note that the list was too long to include it in this response]

**Key Dates**

* Publication Date: December 6, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 16, 2023, 14:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Notice Type**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation, and the DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is open to suppliers under the following trade agreements:

[List of trade agreements, please note that the list was too long to include it in this response]

**Security Requirements**

* Reliability security clearance required for the supplier
* Security level required: None

**Location of Work**

The work will be performed in the National Capital Region (NCR) with possible in-person meetings or discussions at DND facilities.

**How to Submit Interests**

To submit an interest in this RFP, please contact Kelsey Lawrence at kelsey.lawrence2@forces.gc.ca. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Pre-Bid Meeting**

There is no pre-bid meeting scheduled for this opportunity.

**Queries**

Any queries related to this Notice of Proposed Procurement shall be directed to Kelsey Lawrence.

INFORMATION ADDITIONNEL POUR LES FOURNISSEURS
 Pour les besoins en matière de services, les soumissionnaires doivent présenter les renseignements demandés, tel que le décrit l’article 2.3 de la partie 2 de la demande de soumissions.

In the rewritten entry I included:

1. A clear "Notice of Proposed Procurement"
2. A concise overview of the procurement
3. The eligible suppliers (a list of pre-qualified suppliers was removed to keep the entry
